title: League and computer crashes after freeze in load screen
body:
Hello everyone!
I can normally join a game in the client and the game will start loading. Partway into loading the client freezes, I cannot alt+tab or do anything. I have to hold my computer power button to turn off my computer. 
After restarting my computer and restarting league, my client is set to US, instead of EUW which I normally play on. Then I have to reselect EUW and I can log in again. This happens about once every 10 games, this resulted in getting me into low-priority queus for 2 times.

Is this a known issue and does anyone know how to fix it?

replies.body: Are you on Windows 10?  This issue might be the result of the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been known to cause freezing like this.  Disable it and test it in a custom game, and let me know if that does the trick for you.
I am indeed on Windows 10. I did turn off the xbox game bar a while ago, but that sadly had no effect.

Hey thanks for trying!  In this case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help investigate with you directly and pinpoint the cause.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to collect some logs, and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can get more context.  We'll see you there!
